unpatched_vulnerabilities.description: Unverified SSL context detected. This will permit insecure connections without verifying SSL certificates. Use 'ssl.create_default_context' instead.
unpatched_vulnerabilities.explanation: Semgrep python.lang.security.unverified-ssl-context.unverified-ssl-context: Unverified SSL context detected. This will permit insecure connections without verifying SSL certificates. Use 'ssl.create_default_context' instead.
